Academic Masterclass

We are delighted to extend a warm welcome to each one of you as you embark on an exciting journey of academic excellence and personal growth here at British University Vietnam, in collaboration with the University of London. Congratulations on choosing to begin your educational adventure with us!. The International Foundation Program is a vital stepping stone that will prepare you for success in your chosen undergraduate program. As you join our vibrant and diverse community, you are taking the first steps towards achieving your academic and career aspirations. At British University Vietnam, we pride ourselves on providing a world-class education, fostering a supportive and inclusive environment, and nurturing talent. Here, you will find a team of dedicated educators and staff who are committed to helping you excel academically, develop essential life skills, and make lasting connections with your fellow students.

*Please note: As IFP and UOL exams are generally paper based/hand written, please ensure you bring a pen with you to every class.

Learning Objectives:

+  Explore a rich curriculum that builds a strong foundation in your chosen field of study.

+  Engage in hands-on learning experiences and practical projects.

+  Connect with professors who are experts in their respective fields.

+  Participate in extracurricular activities and clubs to enrich your university experience.

+  Access top-notch facilities and resources to support your academic journey.
